verbose_text: Strikingly, it also suggests that the sole function of the resolving cysteine of Tpx1 in H 2 O 2 -induced activation of Pap1 is to promote Txl1 oxidation (XREF_FIG E) and, thus, prevent Txl1 from reducing Pap1 (XREF_FIG A and 6B).
evidence: Pap1 is to promote Txl1 oxidation ( XREF_FIG E) and, thus, prevent Txl1
